TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi FileListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 找到並列出在執行階段由 屬性在目錄中指定的檔案。

span.span: Locates and lists files in the directory specified by the property at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控制項來顯示選取的檔案類型的檔案清單。Use this control to display a list of files selected by file type. 您可以建立對話方塊在您的應用程式，例如，可讓使用者選取檔案群組。You can create dialog boxes in your application that, for example, enable the user to select a file or group of files. 如果您也會顯示和控制項，您可以撰寫程式碼以同步化它們與`FileListBox`控制項並與彼此。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `FileListBox` control and with each other. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`FileListBox`在執行階段顯示的檔案清單中指定的目錄。A `FileListBox` displays a list of files in a given directory at run time. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示中的檔案類型標準為基礎的控制項`Archive`作業系統的環境中使用的檔案屬性。Use this property to specify the type of files to display in a control, based on standard `Archive` file attribute used in the operating environment. 在執行的階段重設的程式碼中設定這個屬性控制項來顯示具有指定的屬性，這些檔案。Setting this property in code at run time resets the control to display only those files that have the specified attribute. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnDoubleClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnDoubleClick (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnDoubleClick`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The `OnDoubleClick` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

[!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的目前路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the current path for a .

value.span: ，包含目前路徑，但不包括檔案名稱。

span.span: A that contains the current path, not including the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`Path`屬性是字串，表示路徑，例如 C:\Ob 或 C:\Windows\System。The value of the `Path` property is a string indicating a path, such as C:\Ob or C:\Windows\System. 如控制項中，預設值是目前的路徑在執行階段建立控制項時。For a control, the default is the current path when the control is created at run time. 當您在建立應用程式的檔案瀏覽和管理功能，請使用這個屬性。Use this property when you are building an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 設定`Path`屬性有效果類似於 MS-DOS`chdir`命令; 或磁碟機規格不允許相對路徑。Setting the `Path` property has effects similar to the MS-DOS `chdir` command; relative paths are allowed with or without a drive specification. 使用冒號 （:） 中指定的磁碟機選取該磁碟機上目前的目錄。Specifying only a drive with a colon (:) selects the current directory on that drive. `Path`屬性也可以設定的完整的網路路徑不含磁碟機連線使用下列語法：The `Path` property can also be set to a qualified network path without a drive connection using the following syntax: ``` \\servername\sharename\path ``` 值變更`Path`如控制項產生事件。Changing the value of `Path` for a control generates an event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 發生於在程式碼中設定 或 屬性來變更路徑時。

span.span: Occurs when the path is changed by setting the or property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`PathChange`事件程序以回應中的路徑變更控制項。You can use a `PathChange` event procedure to respond to path changes in a control. 當您指派字串，包含的新路徑屬性，會叫用控制項`PathChange`事件。When you assign a string that contains a new path to the property, the control invokes the `PathChange` event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Pattern { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在執行階段於 控制項中顯示的檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the file names displayed in a control at run time.

value.span: 字串運算式，表示檔案規格，例如"\*。\*「 或 」\*。方式 」。

span.span: A string expression indicating a file specification, such as "\*.\*" or "\*.FRM".

value.span: 預設值是"\*。\*"，它會傳回所有檔案的清單。

span.span: The default is "\*.\*", which returns a list of all files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Pattern`屬性扮演重要的角色中設計的應用程式檔案瀏覽和管理功能。The `Pattern` property plays a key role in designing an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 使用`Pattern`搭配其他檔案控制項屬性，以提供使用者的方式，來瀏覽檔案或類似的檔案群組。Use `Pattern` in combination with other file-control properties to give the user ways to explore files or groups of similar files. 例如，專門用來啟動其他程式應用程式中，您可以指定，顯示唯一的.exe 檔案在檔案清單方塊 (\*.exe)。For example, in an application dedicated to starting other programs, you could designate that only .exe files be displayed in the file list box (\*.exe). 除了使用萬用字元，您也可以使用多種模式，並以分號 （;） 分隔。In addition to using wildcard characters, you can also use multiple patterns separated by semicolons (;). 例如，"*.exe;*.bat"會傳回所有可執行檔和所有 MS-DOS 批次檔的清單。For example, "*.exe; *.bat" would return a list of all executable files and all MS-DOS batch files. 值變更`Pattern`屬性會產生事件。Changing the value of the `Pattern` property generates a event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 發生於檔案清單模式 (如 "*.\*") 是透過設定程式碼中的 或 屬性來進行變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the file listing pattern, such as "*.\*", is changed by setting the or property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`PatternChange`事件程序以回應中的模式變更控制項。You can use a `PatternChange` event procedure to respond to pattern changes in a control. 當您指派字串，包含新的模式，來叫用的屬性，FileListBox事件。When you assign a string that contains a new pattern to the property, the FileListBox invokes the event. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，判斷 控制項是否包含具有唯讀屬性的檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a control contains files that have read-only attributes.

value.span: 如果將顯示具有 屬性的檔案，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if files that have the attribute will be displayed; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`ReadOnly`屬性控制項，指定是否檔案具有唯讀屬性會顯示在檔案清單。Use the `ReadOnly` property for a control to specify whether files that have read-only attributes are displayed in the file list or not. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`true`檔案具有唯讀屬性會顯示 （預設值），不論`ReadOnly`屬性設定。If the property is set to `true` (the default), files that have read-only attributes are displayed regardless of the `ReadOnly` property setting. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 強制控制項使其工作區失效，並且立即重繪其本身。

span.span: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

para.span: 當您覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫讓失效並且重繪控制項和其子控制項的基底類別的方法。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如控制項，`Sorted`一律會傳回`false`。For the control, `Sorted` always returns `false`. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

span.span: Gets or sets the property to use as the actual value for the items in a .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不應該設定為控制項等控制項，只是因為，為了控制項繼承自。This property should not be set for the control; it is provided only because the control inherits from . [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
